description: who we are : we are a rapidly growing technology company of dedicated professionals striving to make a difference in the world of data security. our platform, netwrix auditor, empowers organizations to minimize the risk of data breaches and ensure regulatory compliance by proactively reducing the exposure of sensitive data and promptly detecting policy violations and suspicious user behavior. the company is headquartered in irvine, california, and has regional offices in the u.s. (ohio), the uk, benelux, france, germany, italy, the czech republic, india, singapore and russia (st. petersburg). the russian branch of netwrix corporation continues to evolve. now we are looking for a web project manager to target regional and global markets. please respond in english only. summary: we are looking for an experienced web project manager to lead a scrum team that maintains key digital projects, including websites and in-house digital solutions. essential duties and responsibilities: formulate objectives for website developers and designers; analyze and investigate project requirements, achieve project goals; maintain the work process and anticipate bottlenecks, ensure that projects meet deadlines; align digital initiatives with overall marketing and company goals, prioritizing and planning tasks according to schedules and available resources; report regularly to the management and product owners on project status and capacity plan updates; facilitate meetings, including sprint planning, a daily stand-up, and retrospective; improve cross-team processes to achieve seamless and effective collaboration. requirements: written and spoken english language skills, including business communication (b2 or higher level); experience 2+ years as a project manager; practical knowledge of project management methodologies (agile, sсrum, etc.); understanding of web technologies and sdlc phases and processes; excellent organizational, analytical and communication skills; ability to meet tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment; hands-on experience in software development is a great advantage. we offer: office in a modern business center right next to the “staraya derevnya” subway station; employment according to the labor code of the russian federation; competitive compensation depending on experience and skills; upbeat working environment; challenging projects and a variety of tasks; flexible working hours and relaxed dress-code; extended medical insurance (including dental coverage and travel insurance); fitness compensation and company-paid sports activities (football, volleyball); free corporate english classes; opportunities for professional growth and promotion; opportunity to travel for professional conferences and training (including foreign countries); office library with specialized work-related books and magazines; awesome corporate events; lounge zone with kicker and ping-pong; well-equipped kitchen (coffee, tea, cookies and fruits). :)
name: web project manager
key_skills: Agile Project Management|Business English|Scrum|Веб-программирование|Web-дизайн|Графический дизайн|Project management|B2B Marketing
